base_description: White cardboard box with open flaps.
part_description: Box has four flaps, two large, two small, with printed text and arrow. Flaps are rectangular, positioned on top, varying in size.
internal_interaction_description: The flaps interact by folding over each other to close the box. The larger flaps overlap the smaller ones, providing a secure closure when folded. The printed text and arrow on the flaps guide proper orientation.
external_interaction_description: The box interacts with external elements by serving as a container for items. It provides protection and organization, and the printed arrow and text guide handling. The box can be stacked or transported, interacting with other boxes and surfaces.
